name: columnValueStdDevToBeBetween
description: This schema defines the test ColumnValueStdDevToBeBetween. Test the std. dev. value in a col is within a range.

parameterDefinition.name: minValueForStdDevInCol
parameterDefinition.description: Expected std. dev value for the column to be greater or equal than

parameterDefinition.name: maxValueForStdDevInCol
parameterDefinition.description: Expected std. dev value for the column to be greater or equal than
